name: CCC: CyberCityCAB
description:
In CyberCity, CABs are illegal and all how disobeys will be annihilated. So now you need to keep one hand on the wheel and the other on the trigger.

This game is made for Ludum Dare 41 under the theme "Combine 2 Incompatible Genres". The genres I picked are "Score Attack Racing" and "Top Down Shooters".
